TEXT.TITLE: COMMUNICATIONS AND CABLE <CCAB.O> BUYS STAKE
TEXT.BODY: Communications and Cable Inc said it acquired about 21 pct of the outstanding shares of Imnet Corp, a privately owned company that designs, makes and services proprietary image storage and retrieval systems. Terms were not disclosed. Reuter
